Title: Sumika's Notes - Entry 160
Text:
(The handwriting is noticeably rushed.)
It should be around noon. I've reached the third floor of Neon Tower. Rubble from the buildings is scattered and floating around like a shattered kaleidoscope. Some pieces have even stuck to my clothes. I must look like I'm covered in rainbow frosting.

â€¦But my body is getting colder. Turns out I was right. Either these "sugar crystals" or the entire city are slowly draining the body heat of anyone who doesn't belong here.

I need to keep moving. I have to find the right path to the top, and fast.
